590  void set_mc_integration_npoints(unsigned int npoints)
591  {
592  if(npoints > 0){
593  mc_integ_mode_ = true;
594  mc_npoints_ = npoints;
595  }
596  else {
597  mc_integ_mode_ = false;
598  }
599  }
600 
615  void set_approximate_compilation_time(double compilation_time_in_seconds)
616  {
617  if(compilation_time_in_seconds > 0.0){
618  approx_compilation_mode_ = true;
619  approx_compilation_n_ = 0;
620  approx_compilation_time_ = compilation_time_in_seconds;
621  }
622  else {
623  approx_compilation_mode_ = false;
624  }
625  }
626 
641  void set_approximate_compilation_nsamples(unsigned int n)
642  {
643  if(n > 0){
644  approx_compilation_mode_ = true;
645  approx_compilation_n_ = n;
646  }
647  else {
648  approx_compilation_mode_ = false;
649  }
650  }

740  plFloat get_last_computed_loglikelihood()const
741  {
742  if(last_computed_loglikelihood_ == std::numeric_limits<plFloat>::infinity())
743  throw plError(124);
744 
745  return last_computed_loglikelihood_;
